maqras.text: 26|1|Ta xin, mi mu,
26|2|zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian de jie wen.
26|3|Yinwei tamen bu xindao, ni huoxu qi de yao si.
26|4|Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang cong tianshang jiang shi tamen yige jixiang, tamen jiu wei ta er fushou tie er.
26|5|Mei feng you xin de jinian cong zhiren zhu jiang shi tamen, tamen dou beiqi ta.
26|6|Tamen que yi fouren zhenli, tamen suo chaoxiao de shi de jieju, jiang jianglin tamen.
26|7|Nandao tamen meiyou guancha da di ma? Wo shi ge zhong youliang de zhiwu zai da dishang fanyan.
26|8|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang. Dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de.
26|9|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|10|Dangri, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa (shuo):“Ni qu jiaohua na bu yi de minzhong.
26|11|Ji falao de minzhong. Tamen zenme bu jingwei an la ni?”
26|12|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen fouren wo,
26|13|yizhi wo fanmen kouchi, suoyi qiu ni paiqian ha lun (he wo yidao qu).
26|14|Tamen ceng jia zui yu wo, wo pa tamen shahai wo.”
26|15|Zhu shuo:“Jue bu ruci, ni lia daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Wo que shi yu nimen zai yiqi ting (nimen de bianlun) de.
26|16|Ni lia dao falao nali shuo:‘Women que shi zhong shijie de zhu de shizhe,
26|17|qing ni shifang yiselie de houyi, rang wo lia dai tamen qu.’”
26|18|Falao shuo:“Nandao women meiyou zai women de jiazhong ba ni zi you fuyang chengren, erqie ni zai women jiazhong douliuguo xuduo nian ma?
26|19|Ni ceng ganle ni suo gan di na jian shi, ni shi wang'en de.”
26|20|Ta shuo:“Dangri, wo bu dongshi di ganle na jian shi.
26|21|Wo jiu weiju nimen, er taobi nimen, suihou, wo de zhu ba zhihui shangci wo, bingqie paiqian wo wei shizhe,
26|22|ni zebei wo wang'en, ni suowei de en shi ni ceng nuyi yiselie de houyi.”
26|23|Falao shuo:“Zhong shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
26|24|Ta shuo:“Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ruguo nimen shi quexin zhe.”
26|25|Falao dui ta zuoyou de ren shuo:“Nimen zenme bu qingting ne?”
26|26|Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
26|27|Falao shuo:“Fengming lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe, que shi yige fengzi.”
26|28|Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) dongfang he xifang, yiji jie hu dongxi zhi jian de zhu, ruguo nimen neng liaojie.”
26|29|Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni she wo er jing shi bie de shenling, wo shibi shi ni bian cheng yige qiufan.”
26|30|Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo zhaoshi ni yige mingzheng ne?”
26|31|Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, ni jiu zhaoshi yige mingzheng ba!”
26|32|Ta jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran bian cheng yitiao mang;
26|33|ta ba ta de shou chou chulai, na zhi shou zai guanzhong de yanqian huran xiande bailiang liang de.
26|34|Falao dui ta de zuoyou de guizumen shuo:“Zhe que shi yige gaoming de shushi,
26|35|ta xiang ping ta de moshu, ba nimen zhu chu guojing, nimen you she me jianyi ne?”
26|36|Tamen shuo:“Qing ni kuanxian ta he ta di gege, bing pai zhengmu yuan dao ge chengshi qu,
26|37|tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni zheli lai.”
26|38|Shushimen zai zhiding de riqi, yi zhiding de shijian jihe qilai.
26|39|Youren dui minzhong shuo:“Nimen jihe qilaile ma?
26|40|Ruguo shushimen huosheng, women huoxu shuncong tamen.”
26|41|Shushimen lai dao de shihou, tamen dui falao shuo:“Ruguo women desheng, women bi shou baochou ma?”
26|42|Ta shuo:“Shi de, zai na shi, nimen bi meng chongxing.”
26|43|Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen keyi pao xia nimen suoyao pao de dongxi.”
26|44|Tamen jiu pao xiale tamen de sheng he zhang, tamen shuo:“Zhi falao de quanli fashi, women biran desheng.”
26|45|Mu sa jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran tun xia tamen suo huanhua de (dashe).
26|46|Shushimen jiu baidao xiaqu.
26|47|Tamen shuo:“Women yi xinyang zhong shijie de zhu——
26|48|mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”

26|49|Falao shuo:“Wo hai meiyou yunxu nimen, nimen jiu xiangxin tamenle ma? Ta bi shi nimen de toumu, shi ta chuanshou nimen de moshu, nimen bujiu jiu zhidao, wo bi jiaohuzhe kan nimen de shou he jiao, wo bi jiang nimen quanti ding zai shizijia shang.”
26|50|Tamen shuo:“Na ye mei shenme, women jiang guiyu women de zhu.
26|51|Women dique kewang women de zhu she you women de guoshi, yinwei women shi shouxian gui xin de.”
